Room.Name: East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: You are on East Ulandia, near the east bank of the Baldywyne River.
Room.LongDescription: Most of the bank for as far as you can see is lush and green, but for some reason, there's no vegetation here. The ground looks absolutely sterile, without even a weed growing. In places it even looks scorched. The Brownhaven South Bridge is just up the road to the north, and this unhappy condition seems to extend to the underside of the bridge.
